Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Shohn-Lowt was a Chagrian male Jedi Master active during the Galactic War. Around 3641 BBY, during the Invasion of Belsavis, he was hunting the Sith Lord the Tyrant, who had escaped from the Tomb of Belsavis. He was injured in the pursuit and asked a Republic citizen to kill Tyrant.
